price: Ils invoquent ce dont le préjudice est certainement plus proche que le bénéfice. Quel mauvais allié, et quel mauvais compagnon !
arabic: يَدۡعُواْ لَمَن ضَرُّهُۥٓ أَقۡرَبُ مِن نَّفۡعِهِۦۚ لَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَوۡلَىٰ وَلَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡعَشِيرُ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yadʿū laman ḍarruhu aqrabu min nafʿihi labi'sa al-mawlā walabi'sa al-ʿashīru
